PHRASE.LANG: Peace and tranquility are not often associated with dragons, least they find themselves upon a mountain of gold. Show off the calmer side of the fire-breathing beast with these flowing tattoo designs. Full set includes back, chest, leg and arm tattoos. [#Legal]

Paix et tranquillité ne sont pas souvent associées aux dragons, encore moins se retrouver devant une montagne d'or. Vante la face calme du monstre cracheur de feu avec ces dessins fluides de tatouages. Ensemble complet inclue tatouages de dos, torse, jambes et bras. [#Legal]

Frieden und Gelassenheit sind nicht die ersten Attribute von Drachen, am aller wenigsten befinden sie sich auf einem Berg voller Gold. Zeige die ruhigere Seite des Feuerspuckenden Biests mit diesen fließenden Tattoo-Kreationen. Komplettes Set mit Rücken, Brust und Beintätowierung. [#Legal]

Pace e tranquilitá non si associano comunmente ai dragoni, almeno che essi si trovino su una montagna d'oro. Mostra il lato piú pacifico della bestia mangia fuococon questi disegni di tatuaggi scorrevoli. Il set completo include tatuaggi per la schiena, petto, gamba e braccio. [#Legal]

La paz y la tranquilidad generalmente no se asocian con los dragones, almenos que éstos se encuentren sobre una montaña de oro. Muestra el lado más tranquilo de la bestia escupe fuego con estos diseños de tatuajes fluídos. El set completo incluye tatuajes para espalda, pecho y pierna. [#Legal]

Peace and tranquility are not often associated with dragons, least they find themselves upon a mountain of gold. Show off the calmer side of the fire-breathing beast with these flowing tattoo designs. Full set includes back, chest, leg and arm tattoos. [#Legal]

Peace and tranquility are not often associated with dragons, least they find themselves upon a mountain of gold. Show off the calmer side of the fire-breathing beast with these flowing tattoo designs. Full set includes back, chest, leg and arm tattoos. [#Legal]
